explanation: [0-0] A young boy stands next to a wall, holding a soccer ball. A person is lying on the floor tiles by the wall. The person is wearing a blue robe and a white headscarf, lying sideways facing the wall. On the floor tiles beside him is a piece of white cloth, on top of which there is a blue loudspeaker, a metal bowl, a blue flashlight, and some paper money.

[0-9] The boy walks forward while playing with the soccer ball. He walks to the side of the person in blue, looks down, then holds the soccer ball with his right hand and waves his left hand in front of his nose. Then he puts the soccer ball in his left hand, bends down, picks up the blue microphone from the ground with his right hand, and places the microphone behind the buttocks of the person in blue. Immediately afterwards, he picks up the blue loudspeaker next to him and places it behind the head of the person in blue.

[9-18] Then the little boy takes the soccer ball and turns to walk away. Then there is a loud bang, which startles the man on the ground and he immediately sits up, his headscarf falling off. He is seen to be a middle-aged man. He then turns his head to the left, then turns his body to the left, looks around, then looks up, first looking to the left, then turning his head to look to the right, with a panicked expression. Then he covers his chest with his right hand, gasping for breath.
